Reseach activities

I was part of the following program comitees:

  • International Workshop on Smalltalk Technology 2015. Co-located with the International ESUG Conference. Brescia, Italy.
  • Workshop en Ingeniería de Software e Tecnologías de la Información (WISIT) 2014. Buenos Aires, Argentina.
  • Workshop en Ingeniería de Software e Tecnologías de la Información (WISIT) 2013. Buenos Aires, Argentina.

I was also co-reviewer internationales in the following international conferences and symposiums: SLE 2014, DLS 2013, DLS 2012, ASSE JAIIO 2011.

I participated in the organization of the following international and argentine research events:

  • Workshops Co-Chair in ECOOP 2015.
  • Co-Organizer Workshop WISIT 2014.
  • Co-Organizer Workshop Uqbar 2013.
